# samsungcloudplatformv2_ske_nodepool (Data Source)

show nodepool

## Example Usage

```terraform
provider "samsungcloudplatformv2" {
}

data "samsungcloudplatformv2_ske_nodepool" "nodepool" {
    id = var.id
}


output "nodepool" {
  value = data.samsungcloudplatformv2_ske_nodepool.nodepool
}


variable "id" {
  type    = string
  default = ""
}
```

Read-Only:

  - maximum: 85

  - maximum: 85
  - minimum: 10

  - minimum: 10
  - example: 110
- `pod_max_pids` (Number) Node Pool Pod Max pids constraint

  - example: 4096
